name: Knuckle blast
description:
This is one of those booming games that will blow your mind!
Highly brainteasing levels where you need to time each toss to blow the target and collect as many stars as possible,
90 smashing levels, different worlds and lots of fun, and the very best part is that this is a totally free game for a limited time so download the Knuckle Blaster right away!

Quick launch and you can play agains players from all over the world and put your name onto the highscore list!
